text: There's something about SNES RPG music. It's like comfort food for my ears. For some reason, I know I very much enjoyed my playthrough of this game but I barely remember any of the story. I read the Plot section on Wikipedia and this is all it says: "There is a villain called the Dark King. He was sealed away until an unsuspecting treasure hunter releases him by attempting to get "treasure". Now Red, Blue, Rain, and Ponga have to stop him." Now all I'm imagining is Red and Blue from Pokémon taking on a villain with the most generic name.
author: SupraDarky

text: Wouldnt be the worst old school RPG plot i have ever heard.
author: nils0a

text: I COMPLETELY forgot this game existed until I saw this video, holy crap!
author: Jack

text: Loved this game! so slept on though its a shame. everything about it was great: combat, music, graphics. Definitely in my top 5 SNES RPGs.
author: JZA the Jenius

text: Got some tricky time changes in here. Interesting. I'm too lazy to figure out what it is though.
author: Jay DiNItto

text: I love how that little hi-hat trick makes this sound like (2+2+2+3)/8 turning into a truly compound 9/8. Soooo simple, yet so effective :)
